title: 159. Sensational
description:
Today Chris talks about the Oscars, and congratulations to Bong Joon Ho, favorite past Oscar moments like James Cameron’s acceptance and Travolta trying to say Idina Menzel, Future, Only Fans, white knights, and making sure you get that scrilla.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
